summary.para: Creates a new image encoder object.

param.name: pD2DDevice
param.para: The object on which the corresponding image encoder is created.

param.name: ppWICImageEncoder
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives a pointer to the interface for the encoder object that you can use to encode Direct2D images.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: You must create images to pass to the image encoder on the same Direct2D device that you pass to this method.
